module.sqlWrap: SELECT * FROM SchedulePictures WHERE PictureId in (SELECT MAX(PictureId) FROM TrendPicture WHERE ScheduleId IN (@ScheduleId) GROUP BY ScheduleId )
Insert Into [SchedulePictures] ( ScheduleId, PictureUrl, PicturePath, CreatedTime, Width, Height ) Values ( @ScheduleId, @PictureUrl, @PicturePath, @CreatedTime, @Width, @Height ) Select @@Identity
Update [SchedulePictures] Set ScheduleId=@ScheduleId, PictureUrl=@PictureUrl, PicturePath=@PicturePath, CreatedTime=@CreatedTime Where Picture = @Picture
Select * from SchedulePictures where ScheduleId = @ScheduleId Order by CreatedTime desc
Select count(1) from SchedulePictures where ScheduleId = @ScheduleId
